name: ESPForm for Arduino
keywords: WiFi, espp8266, esp32, captive portal, web form, AP portal
description: The simple HTML Form Elements data interchanges library for ESP32/ESP8266 through the Webserver. The library allows user to send and receive the HTML Form Elements (input, select, textarea, radio, checkbox and button) to/from device (ESP32/ESP8266) based on the events.
